citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:05 am on
07-Aug-19.
The inspector was informed by a relative that the family member was away from the facility and would not be
available until later in the day. No other authorized person was available for inspection.
